page.title: 01HUSBANDS BOSWORTH & AREA
page.content: Grid 04640282 is a rural area in the East Midlands.There are two villages, Husbands Bosworth & Sibbertoft on the grid.25% of the employed village residents work in the village.The remaining 75% commute to surrounding towns mainly the Leicester area.All of them travelling by private transport or walking. 74% of the adults are employed. 79% are at home. 9% are retired. 8% are unemployed. There is a little local industry,a large restaurant,a gravel pit & a small shoe factory.The surrounding farmland is mainly used for dairy farming & sheep.
